ai-sn43:12.6.1_0: “And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?
ai-sn43:12.6.2_0: A mendicant generates enthusiasm, tries, makes an effort, exerts the mind, and strives so that bad, unskillful qualities don’t arise. ...
ai-sn43:12.6.3_0: This is called the path that leads to the unconditioned. ...”
ai-sn43:12.6.4_0: “And what is the path that leads to the unconditioned?

ai-sn43:12.6.6_0: This is called the path that leads to the unconditioned. ...”
